results.title: Life in the Kimberleys
results.creator_credit: Rhys Bedford, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Rhys Bedford has a lot of doors open to him, now that he is the recipient of a scholarship at Hale College in Western Australia. But it is when he returns to his family in Kununurra that Bedford gets to explore and reconnect with his country and heritage.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rhys Bedford, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Rhys Bedford has a lot of doors open to him, now that he is the recipient of a scholarship at Hale College in Western Australia. But it is when he returns to his family in Kununurra that Bedford gets to explore and reconnect with his country and heritage.

results.title: Young and proud
results.creator_credit: Leah Latham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A young, successful and proud Yamatji woman, Leah Latham attributes the person she is today to growing up with different cultures. She acknowledges it can be hard being a mix of English and Indigenous cultures, but believes it has also made her the person she is today.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Leah Latham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: A young, successful and proud Yamatji woman, Leah Latham attributes the person she is today to growing up with different cultures. She acknowledges it can be hard being a mix of English and Indigenous cultures, but believes it has also made her the person she is today.

results.title: The Best life
results.creator_credit: Keifer Yu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Keifer Yu takes us beyond the tourist attractions of Broome, Western Australia, to the cultures therein. Yu focuses on the Indigenous and Chinese cultures of which he is a part. He considers how the differing cultures have enriched his life and how they blend in together in this unique community.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Keifer Yu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Keifer Yu takes us beyond the tourist attractions of Broome, Western Australia, to the cultures therein. Yu focuses on the Indigenous and Chinese cultures of which he is a part. results.title: Lella Smith interview with Emma McRae

video_links.name: Lella Smith interview with Emma McRae

results.brief_description: Lella Smith is the Creative Director of the Walt Disney Animation and Research Library and curator of the ‘Dreams Come True: The Art of Disney’s Classic Fairytales’ exhibition. In this interview, Emma McRae, ACMI Exhibitions Curator, speaks to Lella about how the exhibition came about and the enormous task of selecting the films and items for exhibition from Disney’s vast archives.
results.description: Lella Smith is the Creative Director of the Walt Disney Animation and Research Library and curator of the ‘Dreams Come True: The Art of Disney’s Classic Fairytales’ exhibition. In this interview, Emma McRae, ACMI Exhibitions Curator, speaks to Lella about how the exhibition came about and the enormous task of selecting the films and items for exhibition from Disney’s vast archives.
description_for_label: Lella Smith is the Creative Director of the Walt Disney Animation and Research Library and curator of the ‘Dreams Come True: The Art of Disney’s Classic Fairytales’ exhibition. In this interview, Emma McRae, ACMI Exhibitions Curator, speaks to Lella about how the exhibition came about and the enormous task of selecting the films and items for exhibition from Disney’s vast archives.

results.title: Glen Keane interview with Emma McRae

video_links.name: Glen Keane interview with Emma McRae

results.brief_description: Glen Keane has been with the Walt Disney Studios for over 25 years and is best known for his character animations for feature films such as: ‘The Little Mermaid’, ‘Aladdin’, ‘Beauty and the Beast’, ‘Tarzan’, and ‘Tangled’. In this interview, Emma McRae, ACMI Exhibitions Curator, speaks to Glen about his never-ending passion for drawing and what inspires him to create such unforgettable characters as The Beast and Ariel. Glen also talks about the changes in animation from hand drawn to digital.
results.description: Glen Keane has been with the Walt Disney Studios for over 25 years and is best known for his character animations for feature films such as: ‘The Little Mermaid’, ‘Aladdin’, ‘Beauty and the Beast’, ‘Tarzan’, and ‘Tangled’. In this interview, Emma McRae, ACMI Exhibitions Curator, speaks to Glen about his never-ending passion for drawing and what inspires him to create such unforgettable characters as The Beast and Ariel. Glen also talks about the changes in animation from hand drawn to digital.

In this interview, Emma McRae, ACMI Exhibitions Curator, speaks to Glen about his never-ending passion for drawing and what inspires him to create such unforgettable characters as The Beast and Ariel. Glen also talks about the changes in animation from hand drawn to digital.
